body.name: ZINUS 10 Inch Green Tea Luxe Memory Foam Mattress / Pressure Relieving / CertiPUR-US Certified / Bed-in-a-Box / All-New / Made in USA, Queen
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 42 mins
features: General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding.General Note: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your Mattress to regain its full shape. Any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room. In cold temperature, at delivery, your mattress may take a bit longer to return to full sized from its compressed state.The expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding.
BUILT ALL-NEW FOR COMPLETE COMFORT - An upgrade in every way, experience deep and refreshing sleep like never before with this Luxe version of our beloved Green Tea mattress

MORE TO LOVE – With more memory foam, a soft, breathable knitted cover and natural green tea now in every layer, somehow we managed to improve our most popular mattress to deliver an even more comfortable and supportive sleep. MOST REFRESHING SLEEP YET – Green Tea now infused into every layer ensures freshness as well as ActivCharcoal to block moisture-induced smells every night and day.Top:Green Tea Memory Foam

MADE IN USA OF US FOAM AND GLOBAL MATERIAL – Straight out of our first ever, state-of-the-art, North American production facility in Georgia. CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED – Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED – Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours.
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
body.description: How do we improve one of our most loved mattresses? Innovate and elevate every layer to create a new high performance mattress that's still affordable of course - introducing the all-new Green Tea Luxe Memory Foam Mattress. More is better when it comes to all the great sleep-inducing qualities you love. We infused premium green tea into each and every layer to deliver even more freshness in your mattress night and day. More memory foam in every profile height means more comfort and more sleep. With the just right amount of pressure relief- not too much sink- you’ll sleep with an even more supportive feeling that relieves your achiest joints. No need to worry about overheating as our patented 7-zone ventilation system in the middle layer improves airflow performance, while also adding extra pressure relief beneath areas that need it most, like the shoulders, hips and knees. The finishing touch? A breathable knitted cover for ultra comfortable and refreshing sleep. Shipped straight to your door with a 10-year warranty, we certainly didn’t sleep on improving every single performance layer of this mattress.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A luxe edition of our bestseller Refresh & recharge A premium take on our #1 seller, the Green Tea Luxe Mattress is created with more of what made the original so special. We've crafted it with refreshing green tea extract in every layer, more body-hugging memory foam, and a breathable, luxurious cover. All the stuff that sweet dreams are made of.

Upgrade to the sleep you deserve Crafted for complete comfort Our patented pressure-relief system improves airflow performance and adds pressure relief beneath areas that need it most, like the shoulders, hips, and knees. And supportive foam layers infused with our signature green tea keep things fresh over time for sounder, cooler, and pain-free sleep. Wake up feeling fresh CertiPUR-US certified foam layers infused with green tea extract are crafted to keep your bed smelling and feeling fresh, night after night. With a variety of sizes and profiles to choose from, the Green Tea Luxe is ideal for any sleeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every Penny !
reviews.reviewText: Honestly hands down the best mattress I’ve slept on ! It’s firm but forms to your body perfectly when you lay on it . Best memory foam mattress and not bad on price .Non toxic and hyper-allergenic !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and great product
reviews.reviewText: I got this mattress for a steal during the holidays and it’s so incredibly comfortable. I’m amazed at the quality. I wasn’t looking for anything fancy just something to sleep on temporarily but now this is my main mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm but comfortable
reviews.reviewText: We got the 10inch, in the hopes it would be on the firmer side. It is! We had quite the journey finding the right mattress. We have an older zinus memory foam that I love, but it is a Queen and we now sleep on a king. A couple years ago I ordered what I thought was the same mattress (but in king) and it just wasn’t the same. Too soft, not enough support and I get migraines from it. So then we went mattress shopping and I only like the $6k Tempurpedic firm mattress, of course. Knowing it was possible to find something cheaper, I went ahead and got a “plank” mattress, which was wayyy too firm. But the company was great and refunded. So I decided to take a chance and order this Zinus mattress, knowing how much I loved the original, but having a hard time finding something comparable, since it is no longer sold. Happy to report this mattress is the one! It’s not exact, but close enough that I don’t get migraines. It’s very supportive and doesn’t give in the tummy/hip area during the night. Keeps you straight. I’m 165 pounds. No idea of durability, but I don’t really care. Just relieved to have something that works for now and doesn’t cost $6k.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to set up and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: Im going to start this off with I have never owned a new mattress only hand-me- downs. However, this was my first mattress that came in a box and I love it. I have scoliosis so my mattress comfort is important. So far this mattress has definitely checked that box! I’ve slept on it for a couple days so far and haven’t woken up with back or hip pain as I am a side sleeper! First the mattress does have a nice amount of give not too much or less. I’m also a tossed turner and I have no issues flopping around into different positions. I did not experience a smell from the mattress. Set up was extremely easy! I opened it on my bed frame so I did not have to move it once it set up. The box wasn’t too heavy but I also live on a single floor home so moving it up stairs may be a bit difficult. So far I love this mattress and would recommend to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Easily the best and most comfortable bed I’ve ever had. I paid 3x as much as I did for this mattress and the Zinus brand is better. No joke. I sleep like a rock since receiving this. Came in a box, so awesome and easy to carry for me (about 80lbs). Built in USA so you’re supporting your fellow country people vs some other country that has crappy QC. The customer service people are great too. I called them to register my bed with the warranty they offer included in price and the lady helped me out, was pleasant, didn’t wait on hold for even 5 mins. Zinus has their stuff together and I’m a believer! I bought on a cyber Monday deal but even the regular price far exceeds paying triple for an inferior product with a good brand name. You spend 1/3 of your life in bed. Might as well do I in style and have enough money left over to buy a foundation from Zinus and a couple hundred bucks to spend on a new comforter, sheets, new pillows and dinner at a high end restaurant.This is a no brainer type of deal and my life has changed since I rolled the dice on this brand I have never heard of before. I’m happy to report that instead of tossing/turning on my old pillow top bed I literally fall asleep fast and wake up in the same exact position.The frame is made solid so no squeaky sounds upon laying down, solid feel too. Do what I did and grab a matress and the frame and I even have 14 inches under the bed to store and stow away items that would never fit under a standard bed with box spring.I can’t say enough for the overall experience with Zinus and my excitement rubbed off on my Mom who purchased a full size at regular price for her guest room bed. She then told my aunt who also bought a queen like me. The feeling of not being tired after sleeping 6 hrs/night is priceless! My back pain has subsided, my deep sleep mode is stellar, and my life has been exceptionally better all because of this mattress and frame. Im in sales and honestly could go door to door with this product and be very successful selling these. They sell themselves! If you’re in the market for an A* experience and are skeptical, roll the dice because you will win everytime with this gem of a set up. That is all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have now had this mattress for about a month and we love it!!I was worried about an odor others had mentioned. But, I let it air out and fully expand for 48 hours before we slept on it and there was zero odor!This mattress is the perfect amount of plush and firm. I love soft mattresses BUT my back does not. This offers the best of both worlds and I have had zero back or hip pain upon waking. I’m super active and rest is crucial for my lifestyle. I can honestly say I look forward to crawling into bed every night and have slept through the night with almost zero disruptions since we got this mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent products and service
reviews.reviewText: We purchased a queen-size mattress two years ago, and it's still comfy and gives our bodies the ideal support. We're rather happy with it. We recently bought a full-size mattress, and when it was delivered, we immediately believed the size wasn't proper. We asked for a return and a replacement, and the seller immediately shipped a replacement and issued a return notice. When the second delivery arrived, I saw that the size seemed to match the first. After getting in touch with the seller, they provided a thorough explanation of how the goods would swell to its typical size when opened. I did what they said, and everything worked out just as they had said. Throughout the communication process, they responded promptly and patiently explained the situation. Their products and service are excellent.
